configuration.description: Additional configuration for the Git command.

e.description: The execution context for the Git command.

question: 如何將名為'packageInfo'的物件的屬性'version'更新為'1.2.3'，確保只有在新值與現有值不同，或者'version'尚未是該物件的屬性時才進行更新？

function.name: vOe
function.description: This function updates a property of an object to a new value, but only if the new value is different from the existing one or if the property does not already exist on the object.

e.description: The property of the object to update.

t.description: The new value to assign to the property.

question: 我如何使用特定的時間單位“天”計算日期“2023-04-01”和“2023-04-15”之間的天數差？

function.name: sTe
function.description: This function calculates the difference between two dates in a specified time unit.

r.description: The start date for the calculation.

e.description: The end date for the calculation.

t.description: The unit of time to calculate the difference in. For example, 'days', 'hours', etc.

question: 如何從舊的虛擬節點oldVirtualNode更新DOM事件監聽器到新的虛擬節點newVirtualNode，考慮到新的虛擬節點具有需要被標準化和更新的點擊事件？

function.name: updateDOMListeners
function.description: This function updates the DOM event listeners from an old virtual node to a new one, ensuring that any changes in event listeners are properly handled and applied to the target element.

oldVnode.description: The old virtual node, containing data about previous event listeners.

vnode.description: The new virtual node, containing data about current event listeners.

question: 當提供的值為 'plaintext-only' 時，我如何確定 'contenteditable' 屬性的適當布林值表示，並確保它是 contenteditable 的有效值？

function.name: convertEnumeratedValue
function.description: This function converts a given key-value pair to a 'true' or 'false' string based on specific conditions. It specifically handles falsy values, the string 'false', and validates the 'contenteditable' attribute's value.

key.description: The attribute key to be evaluated.

value.description: The value associated with the key.
